keyMoments.description: Kokoro reveals herself as a mermaid to save the Straw Hats
keyMoments.significance: Major world-building moment and heroic rescue

keyMoments.description: Robin overcomes her trauma from Ohara and accepts that she has found friends
keyMoments.significance: Completes Robin's emotional arc and validates the crew's declaration of war on the World Government

keyMoments.description: The crew begins their escape on the hijacked government ship
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the escape phase from Enies Lobby

keyMoments.description: The Buster Call continues to devastate Enies Lobby
keyMoments.significance: Maintains tension and creates urgency for all escape attempts
